tgt_original: śuklavarṇaṃ bodhyaṅgīmudrādharaṃ vairocanam ,  tato dakṣiṇadale pītatrāṃkārajaṃ pītavarṇa  varadamudrādharaṃ ratnasambhavam ,
tata uttaradale śyāmakhaṃkārajaṃ śyāmavarṇamabhayamudrāgharamamoghasiddhi  ca bhāvayitvā |
ete pañca tathāgatā kāṣāyavastraprāvṛtāḥ soṣṇīṣāḥ śirastuṇḍamuṇḍitāḥ
ṣaṭpāramitā  dānaṃ gomayamambunā ca sahitaṃ śīlaṃ ca saṃmārjanaṃ
etāḥ pāramitāḥ ṣaḍeva labhate kṛtvā munermaṇḍalam ||
